version_description:
- Added indicators and detail information about the status of each of your services
- Improved messaging of outage information
- Customers now have the ability to schedule a call from the Contact Us page for XFINITY Home Security

- Added indicators and detail information about the status of each of your services
- Improved messaging of outage information
- Customers now have the ability to schedule a call from the Contact Us page for XFINITY Home Security
Various bug fixes and enhancements
Various bug fixes and enhancements

· Support for TouchID for authentication to view your bill if logged in after 30 mins
· Updated look and feel for the More screen
· Updates to Service Status
· Updated customer surveys
· Various bug fixes and other improvements

· Support for TouchID for authentication to view your bill if logged in after 30 mins
· Updated look and feel for the More screen
· Updates to Service Status
· Updated customer surveys
· Various bug fixes and other improvements

* Added the ability to schedule a one-time payment for a future date
* Added saved payment methods in billing preferences
* Updated the look and feel of the appointment reminder. Also added push notifications for appointment reminders, when we are on the way, and when we are arriving. (NOT IN ALL MARKETS)
* Added the ability to schedule a callback for billing related questions
* Customers with delinquent accounts can now make a partial payment

* Added the ability to schedule a one-time payment for a future date
* Added saved payment methods in billing preferences
* Updated the look and feel of the appointment reminder. Also added push notifications for appointment reminders, when we are on the way, and when we are arriving. (NOT IN ALL MARKETS)
* Added the ability to schedule a callback for billing related questions
* Customers with delinquent accounts can now make a partial payment

· Ability to view recent events in your activity history
· Accessibility improvements
· Design updates to usage meter and usage push notifications
· Support for iOS 10

· Ability to view recent events in your activity history
· Accessibility improvements
· Design updates to usage meter and usage push notifications
· Support for iOS 10

· Initiate an X1 System Refresh to fix common problems
· Manage automatic payments

· Initiate an X1 System Refresh to fix common problems
· Manage automatic payments
·         Bug fixes
·         Bug fixes
·         Miscellaneous updates and bug fixes.
·         Miscellaneous updates and bug fixes.

· Manage your personal email and mobile number
· View additional months of your bill history
· Various bug fixes and updates

· Manage your personal email and mobile number
· View additional months of your bill history
· Various bug fixes and updates

· You can now easily pay your bill using Apple Pay. We’ll be rolling this out to all customers over the next few weeks.
· We’ve updated the payment confirmation screen to include more details.
· New push notifications have been added for Tech ETA to let you know exactly where your tech is.
· Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

· You can now easily pay your bill using Apple Pay. We’ll be rolling this out to all customers over the next few weeks.
· We’ve updated the payment confirmation screen to include more details.
· New push notifications have been added for Tech ETA to let you know exactly where your tech is.
· Other minor enhancements and bug fixes

· We’ve improved the way outages are displayed and have even added in three new types: Email, Video On Demand and Channels.
· There’s a new connection status screen that displays all details related to an outage, including estimated time of resolution (when available) and information about recently resolved outages.
· Introducing the XFINITY Assistant – a new way to find self-service features from Comcast. Have a question about your bill, a wifi issue, or a TV error message? Answers to these and more are now at your fingertips.
· Apple Pay is now available for all customers. You can use it to make a one-time, same day payment.
· Our app icon also received a fresh coat of paint – Check it out!

· We’ve improved the way outages are displayed and have even added in three new types: Email, Video On Demand and Channels.
· There’s a new connection status screen that displays all details related to an outage, including estimated time of resolution (when available) and information about recently resolved outages.
· Introducing the XFINITY Assistant – a new way to find self-service features from Comcast. Have a question about your bill, a wifi issue, or a TV error message? Answers to these and more are now at your fingertips.
· Apple Pay is now available for all customers. You can use it to make a one-time, same day payment.
· Our app icon also received a fresh coat of paint – Check it out!

· Added options for managing your plan, moving/transferring service and managing premium channels
· Improvements to WiFi settings
· Updated the overall look and feel of the app with new colors, fonts, and icons.

· Added options for managing your plan, moving/transferring service and managing premium channels
· Improvements to WiFi settings
· Updated the overall look and feel of the app with new colors, fonts, and icons.

- Improvements to X1 troubleshooting.
- Restart an individual X1 set-top box.
- Updates to the make a payment flow.
- Added support for new wireless gateways.

- Improvements to X1 troubleshooting.
- Restart an individual X1 set-top box.
- Updates to the make a payment flow.
- Added support for new wireless gateways.
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we've swept a few bugs to improve overall performance. ​

We’re always looking for new ways to personalize your experience. Here’s what’s new for you:
- Know what to expect when we’re making improvements to your network. These timely service alerts deliver useful, pertinent news about your specific account. ​
- Print, share and download your bill for easier tracking and budget management.
- Get faster access to the features you use most. From the Overview screen, just swipe on a service to troubleshoot, see WiFi settings, view your channel lineup and find FAQs.
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we've swept a few bugs to improve overall performance. ​

We’re always looking for new ways to personalize your experience. Here’s what’s new for you:
- Know what to expect when we’re making improvements to your network. These timely service alerts deliver useful, pertinent news about your specific account. ​
- Print, share and download your bill for easier tracking and budget management.
- Get faster access to the features you use most. From the Overview screen, just swipe on a service to troubleshoot, see WiFi settings, view your channel lineup and find FAQs.

· Redesigned sign in experience with quick tips on helpful features
· Now you can reschedule a service appointment from anywhere – no call required. Just be sure the appointment isn’t within 24 hours of rescheduling
· Add a mobile number to make resetting your password even easier, plus get timely service updates
· Questions about your Internet plan? Now you can view and manage your plan details while you’re on the go
· Optimized for use with iOS 11

· Redesigned sign in experience with quick tips on helpful features

· Optimized for use with iOS 11

Just in time for the holidays, we’ve got a few updates to make life just a little easier. Here’s what’s new for you:
· A smarter, more responsive Xfinity Assistant at your service. Ask your questions and we’ll direct you to helpful tips and tools.
· Fewer hiccups. Bye-bye bugs!
· Minor updates for a smoother ride all around. ​

Just in time for the holidays, we’ve got a few updates to make life just a little easier. Here’s what’s new for you:
· A smarter, more responsive Xfinity Assistant at your service. Ask your questions and we’ll direct you to helpful tips and tools.
· Fewer hiccups. Bye-bye bugs!
· Minor updates for a smoother ride all around. ​

We’ve got a few updates to make life just a little easier. Here’s what’s new for you:
• Forgot your password? We’ve all been there. We’ve added some helpful recovery options so you won’t get locked out.
• Good news for iPhone X users! We’ve swept for bugs and made a few updates for a better overall experience. Plus, If you’re viewing your bill and you’re asked to sign in again, you can now use Face ID instead of entering your username and password again. ​

We’ve got a few updates to make life just a little easier. Here’s what’s new for you:
• Forgot your password? We’ve all been there. We’ve added some helpful recovery options so you won’t get locked out.
• Good news for iPhone X users! We’ve swept for bugs and made a few updates for a better overall experience. Plus, If you’re viewing your bill and you’re asked to sign in again, you can now use Face ID instead of entering your username and password again. ​
Bug fixes to improve overall performance.
Bug fixes to improve overall performance.

- Trouble with a TV Box? Restarting it can resolve many common issues and now, you can use the app to restart any X1 TV Box in your home. Just choose the TV Box that’s acting up then select “Restart” to try and fix the problem.​

- Trouble with a TV Box? Restarting it can resolve many common issues and now, you can use the app to restart any X1 TV Box in your home. Just choose the TV Box that’s acting up then select “Restart” to try and fix the problem.​
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we've swept a few bugs to improve overall performance. ​
Stay tuned for new features and enhancements coming soon. In the meantime, we've swept a few bugs to improve overall performance. ​
* We recently made some enhancements and fixed some bugs to improve this experience for you.
* We recently made some enhancements and fixed some bugs to improve this experience for you.

- We’ve removed the need for customers to re-authenticate when visiting My Account from the app.
- Customers can now view their My Account details in Spanish from a link at the bottom of the app’s main overview screen and from the Settings menu.
- Xfinity xFi customers will now manage all their Wi-Fi settings in the Xfinity xFi app.
- Various bug fixes to streamline the app experience.

- We’ve removed the need for customers to re-authenticate when visiting My Account from the app.

- Xfinity xFi customers will now manage all their Wi-Fi settings in the Xfinity xFi app.
- Various bug fixes to streamline the app experience.

- Refreshed the look and feel of the Xfinity Assistant to streamline navigation and usability.
- Fixed various bugs to improve app performance.

Managing your scheduled service appointment just got easier! Xfinity customers can now use the My Account app to conveniently modify their service appointments right up until the technician is on the way to their home.

Xfinity customers can now track the shipping status of their self-install kits in the app. A tracking link will be displayed in a banner at the top of the Overview screen.

Minor bugs were also fixed to improve the app experience.

Managing your scheduled service appointment just got easier! Xfinity customers can now use the My Account app to conveniently modify their service appointments right up until the technician is on the way to their home.

Xfinity customers can now track the shipping status of their self-install kits in the app. A tracking link will be displayed in a banner at the top of the Overview screen.

Minor bugs were also fixed to improve the app experience.

Hot off the press, our latest release brings users:
- An enhanced and streamlined appointments experience on Overview that includes a new button to conveniently contact us if you need to reschedule when your tech is already on the way.
- Small updates to the Spanish tile on Overview to better align with overall app design.
- Several performance updates and bug fixes to improve load times and your overall experience.
We fixed some bugs and made some performance enhancements.
We've made some improvements to the app to give you an even better experience.

We fixed a handful of defects to improve the overall performance of the app’s troubleshooting and bill payment capabilities.

If you're still experiencing issues, let us know at https://www.xfinity.com/report-a-bug so we can help resolve the problem.

We made some general updates to improve performance and added a couple new features:
- You can now learn the ins and outs of your X1 Voice Remote using Augmented Reality. Try it out from Overview or from the TV section of the app. (Note: This feature is only available to users with an iPhone 6s or later running a version of iOS 12.)
- The new Outage Map lets you check for potential service outages in your area.

- removed the need to select TV devices twice when troubleshooting your service.
- fixed a bug that caused the billing card on Overview to not refresh for some users after making a payment.
- a handful of other minor bugs to streamline performance.
We fixed a bug that prevented some users from paying their bill using Apple Pay.

- Several performance updates and bug fixes to improve load times and your overall experience.

We made some general updates to improve performance and added a couple new features:
- You can now learn the ins and outs of your X1 Voice Remote using Augmented Reality. Try it out from Overview or from the TV section of the app. (Note: This feature is only available to users with an iPhone 6s or later running a version of iOS 12.)
- The new Outage Map lets you check for potential service outages in your area.

- removed the need to select TV devices twice when troubleshooting your service.
- fixed a bug that caused the billing card on Overview to not refresh for some users after making a payment.
- a handful of other minor bugs to streamline performance.
We fixed a bug that prevented some users from paying their bill using Apple Pay.

Updates in this release:
- Service suspended? Say it ain't so! Xfinity customers can now quickly reactivate their account via the My Account app by making a required minimum payment when prompted after logging in.
- Cleared out several bugs to streamline your experience and improve app performance. RIP bugs. Sorry not sorry.

Updates in this release:
- Service suspended? Say it ain't so! Xfinity customers can now quickly reactivate their account via the My Account app by making a required minimum payment when prompted after logging in.
- Cleared out several bugs to streamline your experience and improve app performance. RIP bugs. Sorry not sorry.

In our latest release, we addressed an urgent bug impacting rescheduling of service appointments for same-day. We also squeezed in several additional bug fixes to continually improve the performance and stability of the app.

In our latest release, we addressed an urgent bug impacting rescheduling of service appointments for same-day. We also squeezed in several additional bug fixes to continually improve the performance and stability of the app.

New Feature: Account switching has finally arrived! Xfinity customers can now manage all of their linked accounts without the hassles of multiple sign-ins. Easily switch between accounts from the "More" menu and "Account Information" screen. As a bonus, all customers can now create or edit an account nickname. Let the creativity flow!

Feature Update: Xfinity Storefront has a new name! Storefront customers will now see their service as "Xfinity Flex" throughout the app.

Fixes: Squashed a handful of bugs to bring you the best possible experience!

- The new Outage Map lets you check for potential service outages in your area.

We made some stability and performance improvements to give you a better experience.
We made some stability and performance improvements to give you a better experience.

We fixed VoiceOver bugs that were causing issues with video playback, form input, and navigation, as well as unlabeled buttons and images. We’ve also updated how your connection status appears, so you’ll only see the details of your status if there’s an issue.

We fixed VoiceOver bugs that were causing issues with video playback, form input, and navigation, as well as unlabeled buttons and images. We’ve also updated how your connection status appears, so you’ll only see the details of your status if there’s an issue.

We fixed a handful of defects to improve the overall performance of the app’s troubleshooting and bill payment capabilities.

If you're still experiencing issues, let us know at https://www.xfinity.com/report-a-bug so we can help resolve the problem.

We fixed some bugs and made some performance enhancements related to paying your bill. When you visit the Billing Preference section, you can now view your billing cycle and even change your bill due date — all in one place.

We're making it easier than ever to manage your Xfinity account. On Overview, primary users can now turn on automatic payments and set up paperless billing. They can also provide a secondary email and mobile phone number to make account recovery quick and painless.

Bug fixes to improve overall stability and performance.

We're making it easier than ever to manage your Xfinity account. On Overview, primary users can now turn on automatic payments and set up paperless billing. They can also provide a secondary email and mobile phone number to make account recovery quick and painless.

Bug fixes to improve overall stability and performance.

This update includes new features to make managing your services easier than ever:
-The option to receive service outage updates
-The minimum operating system requirement has been updated to iOS 10

We always appreciate user feedback. If you’re experiencing issues or have suggestions for how we can further improve the app, please share them here: https://www.xfinity.com/report-a-bug

This release includes an error fix and introduces the new and improved Xfinity Assistant:
• The issue that caused the "Done" button on full-screen service alerts to stop working has been corrected.
• Xfinity Assistant is completely redesigned to provide better troubleshooting, easier account management, and now includes the ability to seamlessly connect you to an agent if you need further assistance.

We always appreciate user feedback. If you’re experiencing issues or have suggestions for how we can further improve the app, please share them here: https://www.xfinity.com/report-a-bug

This release includes an error fix and introduces the new and improved Xfinity Assistant:
• The issue that caused the "Done" button on full-screen service alerts to stop working has been corrected.
• Xfinity Assistant is completely redesigned to provide better troubleshooting, easier account management, and now includes the ability to seamlessly connect you to an agent if you need further assistance.

We always appreciate user feedback. If you’re experiencing issues or have suggestions for how we can further improve the app, please share them here: https://www.xfinity.com/report-a-bug

Your privacy is important. We've made it easier to learn about Xfinity's privacy practices in this latest release. Visit us at xfinity.com/privacy.

If you have any suggestions or experience any issues, please share at https://www.xfinity.com/report-a-bug. We truly appreciate your feedback.

With so many of our customers working and learning from home, we are pausing our data plans through May 13, 2020, giving all customers Unlimited data for no additional charge. Customers with an upcoming appointment will see additional messaging about extra precautions we're now taking to keep everybody safe, including expanded future appointment times, so you can now schedule or reschedule further out if needed.

For more details on Xfinity's response to coronavirus (COVID-19), please visit https://www.xfinity.com/prepare.

We're quickly making improvements to give you an even better app experience.

Customers with an upcoming appointment will see additional messaging about extra precautions we're now taking to keep everybody safe, including expanded future appointment times, so you can now schedule or reschedule further out if needed.

For more details on Xfinity's response to coronavirus (COVID-19), please visit https://www.xfinity.com/prepare.

Managing your scheduled service appointment just got easier. Now you can conveniently modify your service appointments right up until the technician has arrived at your home or if the technician is running late.

If you have any suggestions or experience any issues, please share them at xfinity.com/report-a-bug. We truly appreciate your feedback.
